other_tests.findings: The transplanted kidney fails to take up contrast. Embolization coils are noted. The degree of stranding seen around the transplanted kidney has decreased from prior study. There is no fluid collection or evidence of abscess.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The degree of stranding seen around the transplanted kidney has decreased from prior study.

other_tests.findings: Demonstrated slightly increased stranding around the failed right lower quadrant renal transplant reflecting continued rejection post embolization or infection.
